body:
Darwin/386 (32-bit OS X programs) is officially supported (because there is
no need 32-bit only Macs, there isn't much need to release 32-bit OS X
package and besides people sometimes confuse about which one to choose when
we did provide that in the past). Just -buildmode=c-archive is not. The
focus is likely on amd64/arm/arm64. How important is the support for 32-bit
iOS simulator?
